room_title: Escape room "The Scene of the Crime" by Crazy Cat Escape Room in Houston
review: Great experience with Scene of the Crime. Most of the puzzles were a bit straightforward, and I wish we had just a tad less "free helps" as my team were very efficient at communication after we saw the free clues. Could be a bit more challenging!

room_title: Escape room "The Scene of the Crime" by Crazy Cat Escape Room in Houston
review: Did the Crime Scene and escaped with over 9 minutes to spare. Had a great time and will be back one day. Highly recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "The Scene of the Crime" by Crazy Cat Escape Room in Houston
review: This place is so great! We did the crime scene room and had the best time. We escaped with 4 minutes to spare and have so many great stories to tell just from the 56 minutes spent in that room. Crazy Cat Escape Room is one of the funnest places I've ever been to. Not to mention, Harrison was a great game master. Can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Scene of the Crime" by Crazy Cat Escape Room in Houston
review: We all had such a great time. We successfully solved the murder and escaped the police from coming and taking us away with 6 minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "The Scene of the Crime" by Crazy Cat Escape Room in Houston
review: My husband and I came here for date night and to celebrate my birthday. We had so much fun paired with strangers all working together. We did the CSI style room and were ready to go again!! Would definitely recommend this place for date nights or family fun or even work related team building
